Title: How to switch branches and commit changes in git
Author: GitHub
Description:
Learn how to navigate between branches using the git switch command. In this tutorial, we show you how to return to your main branch and then switch back to your feature branch to make edits. You'll also learn the full workflow of editing a file, checking status, staging with git add, and saving your work with git commit.

#git #GitHub #GitHubForBeginners
